beaches.name: Elafonissi Beach
beaches.description: Elafonissi Beach in Crete, Greece, known for its pink sand and shallow turquoise lagoon.

beaches.name: Whitehaven Beach
beaches.description: Whitehaven Beach, located on Whitsunday Island in Australia, famous for its 99% pure white silica sand.

temples.name: Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple
temples.description: A grand Hindu temple in Srirangapatna dedicated to Lord Ranganatha, an incarnation of Vishnu.

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, admired for its intricate architecture and carvings.

countries.name: France
countries.short: France is known for its art, cuisine, and rich history, from Paris to Provence.

countries.name: Spain
countries.short: Spain offers diverse landscapes, Mediterranean beaches, and a vibrant cultural heritage.
